# useStorageUpload

Hook used to upload any files or JSON data to decentralized storage systems like IPFS, using the `storageInterface` configured on the `ThirdwebProvider`

## Example


```jsx
import { useStorageUpload } from "@thirdweb-dev/react";

export default function Component() {
  const { mutateAsync: upload, isLoading } = useStorageUpload();

  async function uploadData() {
    const filesToUpload = [...];
    const uris = await upload({ data: files });
    console.log(uris);
  }

  return (
    <button onClick={uploadData}>
      Upload
    </button>
  )
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useStorageUpload<T extends UploadOptions = IpfsUploadBatchOptions>(uploadOptions?: T): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult<string[], unknown, StorageUploadOptions<T>, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  uploadOptions | T | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult&lt;string\[\], unknown, StorageUploadOptions&lt;T&gt;, unknown&gt;

Function used to upload files or JSON to decentralized storage systems
